src_original: tāvad evopary antarīkṣān mandāravamahāmandāravāṇāṃ puṣpānāṃ mahāntaṃ puṣpavarṣam abhipravṛṣṭam //  kālānusāraṇacandanameghaḥ kṛta uragasāracandanavarṣam abhipravṛṣṭam /  tādṛśaḥ sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma bodhisattva imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ gandhena sphāritaḥ //
tgt_original: 』即時入是三昧，於虛空中，雨曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華、細末堅黑栴檀，滿虛空中，如雲而下，又雨海此岸栴檀之香——此香六銖，價直娑婆世界——以供養佛。

src_original: na tathā ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ saṃdarśanena bhagavataḥ pūjā kṛtā bhavati yathātmabhāvaparityāgeneti //
tgt_original: 『我雖以神力供養於佛，不如以身供養。

src_original: atha khalu sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma bodhisattvas tasyāṃ velāyām aguruturuṣkakundurukaṃ saṃbhajya campakatailaṃ pibati sma //  satatasamitaṃ gandhaṃ bhakṣayataḥ sugandhatailaṃ pibato dvādaśavarṣaparyantāny abhūvan /  tataḥ sa dvādaśavarṣāṇām atyayāt taṃ svam ātmabhāvaṃ divyavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya gandhatailaplutaṃ  kṛtvā kāyaṃ prajvālayām āsa tathāgatasya pūjakarmaṇe 'sya ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkapūjārtham //  atha khalu tasya bodhisattvasya tābhiḥ kāyapradīpamuktajvalāprabhābhir aśītigaṅgānadīvālukāsamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan //
tgt_original: 』即服諸香——栴檀、薰陸、兜樓婆、畢力迦、沈水、膠香，又飲瞻蔔諸華香油，滿千二百歲已，香油塗身，於日月淨明德佛前，以天寶衣而自纏身，灌諸香油，以神通力願而自然身，光明遍照八十億恒河沙世界。

src_original: teṣu lokadhātuṣv aśītigaṅgānadīvālukāsamās tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadanti sma //
sādhu sādhu kulaputra paramaduṣkara bodhisattvānāṃ vīryārambha bhūtā tathāgatapūjā dharmapūjā / tathā
tgt_original: 『善哉，善哉！ 善男子！ 是真精進，是名真法供養如來。
若以華、香、瓔珞、燒香、末香、塗香、天繒、幡蓋及海此岸栴檀之香，如是等種種諸物供養，所不能及；

src_original: iyaṃ punaḥ kulaputra viśiṣṭāgrā pūjā tasmāt param anyan nāstīti //
tgt_original: 善男子！ 是名第一之施，於諸施中最尊最上，以法供養諸如來故。

src_original: te buddhā imāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīm abhūvan //
tena samayena sarvasattvāpriyadarśano nāma bodhisattvasyātmabhāvadīpyamānasya dvādaśavarṣasahasrāṇām atyayena praśānto 'bhūt //
tgt_original: 其身火燃千二百歲，過是已後，其身乃盡。
